SEARCH

All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
ConsoleView
A view that prints the current state of the world to the console upon every update.
Controller
The controller listens for key and mouse events on the main window and controls the game logic.
Direction
Represents a direction in the game.
Enemy
Represents an enemy in the game world.
FieldType
Represents the type of a field in the game world.
GraphicView
A graphical view of the world.
Labyrinth
Main class of the game.
StartMenu
The start menu window for the game.
View
Classes that want to display the World must implement this interface to be notified when the world updates.
World
The world is our model.
